import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './index.css' const MenuOptions = (props) => { let [products, setProducts] = useState(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/api/products.json') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setProducts(data); }) .catch((err) => {console.log(err)}); }, []) console.log(products) let pizzaElement = <>

) } export default MenuOptions;
